about_the_game:
In bizarre lands, play as a viscous glob of water as you follow a trail of droplets and discover your fate...

Test your reflexes and use your unique abilities to evade enemies and find your path in this surreal platformer.

Features:

  • Traverse your way through 25 hand-crafted levels
  • Unique player mechanics
  • Battle 5 menacing bosses across 4 distinct worlds
  • Original artwork & animation
  • Full controller support
  • Localization support

linux_requirements.minimum:

  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • Storage: 2500 MB available space
